title: blushed tomato, mozzarella and truffle salad with onion rings
ingredients: ½ truffle, thinly shaved (available from specialist greengrocers and some delicatessens)
300ml/½ pint vegetable oil, for deep frying
2 banana shallots, skin removed, cut into rings
85g/3oz plain flour, seasoned with salt and freshly ground black pepper
